titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C16

body.ab: <lb n="c56-0119__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c56-0119.01" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 14<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0119__main__2"/>The next day, contrary to the prognostics of our <lb n="c56-0119__main__3"/> guides, was fine although clouded. <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>We visited the <lb n="c56-0119__main__4"/> source of the Aveiron and rode about the <lb n="c56-0119__main__5"/> valley <del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22451__Start"/>the whole da<del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22451__End"/><mdel>y</mdel>until evening. These sublime and <lb n="c56-0119__main__6"/> magnificent scenes afforded me the greatest <lb n="c56-0119__main__7"/> consolation that I was capable of receiving <lb n="c56-0119__main__8"/> They elevated me from all littleness of feeling <lb n="c56-0119__main__9"/> and although they <del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22473__Start"/>d<del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22473__End"/> did not remove my <lb n="c56-0119__main__10"/> grief they <del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22478__Start"/>t<del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22478__End"/> subdued and tranquilized it. <lb n="c56-0119__main__11"/> In some degree, also they diverted my mind <lb n="c56-0119__main__12"/> from the thoughts <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>over which it had brooded <del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22499__Start"/>over<del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22499__End"/><lb n="c56-0119__main__13"/> for the last month<del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22505__Start"/>s<del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22505__End"/>. I returned in the <lb n="c56-0119__main__14"/> evening, fatigued but less unhappy and convered <lb n="c56-0119__main__15"/> with the family <del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22512__Start"/>t<del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22512__End"/> with more cheerfulness than <lb n="c56-0119__main__16"/><del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22516__Start"/>I<del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22516__End"/> had been <del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22522__Start"/>accustomed<del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22522__End"/><mdel>to</mdel>my custom for some time. My fa<lb n="c56-0119__main__17"/>ther was pleased and Elizabeth overjoyed; "My <lb n="c56-0119__main__18"/> dear Cousin," said she, "You see what happiness <lb n="c56-0119__main__19"/> you diffuse when you are <del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22545__Start"/>cheerful<del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22545__End"/>happy; do <lb n="c56-0119__main__20"/> not relapse again!—<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0119__main__21"/> The following morning the rain poured <lb n="c56-0119__main__22"/> down in torrents and thick mists hid <lb n="c56-0119__main__23"/> the summits of the mountains. I rose early <lb n="c56-0119__main__24"/> but felt unusually melancholy. The rain <lb n="c56-0119__main__25"/> depressed <mdel>my</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>me, my old feelings recurred <lb n="c56-0119__main__26"/> and I was miserable. I knew how my father <lb n="c56-0119__main__27"/> would be dissapointed at this sudden <lb n="c56-0119__main__28"/> change and I wished to avoid him <lb n="c56-0119__main__29"/> untill I had <del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22589__Start"/>rev<del loc="c56-0119__main__d1e22589__End"/> recovered myself so far <lb n="c56-0119__main__30"/> as to conceal the feelings that overpowered <lb n="c56-0119__main__31"/> me — I knew that they would remain <lb n="c56-0119__main__32"/> that day at the inn and as I had<lb n="c56-0120__main__1"/><del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22604__Start"/>n<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22604__End"/>ever inured myself to rain and cold I <lb n="c56-0120__main__2"/> resolved <del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22609__Start"/>t<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22609__End"/> to go to the summit of <lb n="c56-0120__main__3"/> Montanvert <del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22616__Start"/>by myself<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22616__End"/>alone. I remembered <lb n="c56-0120__main__4"/> the effect the view of the tremendous <lb n="c56-0120__main__5"/> and ever moving glacier had <del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22630__Start"/>had<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22630__End"/><lb n="c56-0120__left_margin__1"/>produced<lb n="c56-0120__main__6"/> upon my mind when I first saw it <lb n="c56-0120__main__7"/><del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22647__Start"/>how<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22647__End"/><mdel>i</mdel>It had then filled me with <lb n="c56-0120__main__8"/> a sublime extacy that gave wings <lb n="c56-0120__main__9"/> to the soul and allowed <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>it to soar from <lb n="c56-0120__main__10"/> the <del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22679__Start"/>lower<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22679__End"/>obscure world to light & joy. The <lb n="c56-0120__main__11"/> sight of the awful & majestic in <lb n="c56-0120__main__12"/> nature had indeed always the effect <lb n="c56-0120__main__13"/> of <del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22695__Start"/>tranquillizing the<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22695__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>solemnizing<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>my mind & causing <lb n="c56-0120__main__14"/> me to forget the <del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22715__Start"/>the<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22715__End"/> passing cares <lb n="c56-0120__main__15"/> of life. I determined to go <mdel>f</mdel><del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22726__Start"/>by myself<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22726__End"/>alone<lb n="c56-0120__main__16"/> for I was well acquainted with the <lb n="c56-0120__main__17"/> path and the presence of another <lb n="c56-0120__main__18"/><del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22740__Start"/>had the effect of<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22740__End"/>would destroy<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22747__Start"/>ing<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22747__End"/> the <del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22751__Start"/>solitary<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22751__End"/><lb n="c56-0120__main__19"/> solitary grandeur of the scene.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0120__main__20"/> The ascent <del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22763__Start"/>to the mountain<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22763__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ispre<lb n="c56-0120__main__21"/>cipitous<mdel>w</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22790__Start"/>with<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22790__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>but the path is cut into continual and short <lb n="c56-0120__main__22"/> windings which enable<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22806__Start"/>s<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22806__End"/><del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22810__Start"/>to<del loc="c56-0120__main__d1e22810__End"/> you <lb n="c56-0120__main__23"/> surmount the perpedicularity of <lb n="c56-0120__main__24"/> the mountains– It is a scene terrifical <lb n="c56-0120__main__25"/> ly desolate. In a thousand places the <lb n="c56-0120__main__26"/> traces of the winter avelanche may <lb n="c56-0120__main__27"/> be perceived where trees lie broken <lb n="c56-0120__main__28"/> and strewed on the ground; some <lb n="c56-0120__main__29"/> entirely destroyed others bent leaning<lb n="c56-0121__main__1"/> upon <del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e22839__Start"/>juts in<del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e22839__End"/> the jutting <del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e22844__Start"/>corners<del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e22844__End"/>rocks of the <lb n="c56-0121__main__2"/> mountain, or <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>transversely upon other trees. The <lb n="c56-0121__main__3"/> path as you <del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e22866__Start"/>ascen<del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e22866__End"/> ascend higher is inters<lb n="c56-0121__main__4"/><del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e22874__Start"/>persed<del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e22874__End"/>ected<mdel>wi</mdel><mdel>th</mdel>by ravines of snow, down which <lb n="c56-0121__main__5"/> stones continually roll from above; <lb n="c56-0121__main__6"/> one of the them is particularly dange<lb n="c56-0121__main__7"/>rous as the slightest sound such as even<lb n="c56-0121__main__8"/> speaking in a loud voice <mdel>is</mdel>produces a suffi<lb n="c56-0121__main__9"/> cien<mdel>d</mdel>t concussion of air sufficient <lb n="c56-0121__main__10"/> to draw destruction the head of the <lb n="c56-0121__main__11"/> speaker. The pines here are not <lb n="c56-0121__main__12"/> tall or luxuriant but they are sombre <lb n="c56-0121__main__13"/> and add an air of <del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e22950__Start"/>gravit<del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e22950__End"/><mdel>y</mdel>severity to the scene. <lb n="c56-0121__main__14"/> I looked on the valley beneath.; Vast mist <lb n="c56-0121__main__15"/> were rising from the river which ran <lb n="c56-0121__main__16"/> through<del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e22970__Start"/>t<del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e22970__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>it and curling in thick wreaths <lb n="c56-0121__main__17"/> around the opposite mountains <lb n="c56-0121__main__18"/> whose summits were hid in the <lb n="c56-0121__main__19"/><lb n="c56-0121__left_margin__1"/>uniform clouds, while rain poured from the <lb n="c56-0121__main__20"/> dark sky and added to the melancholy <lb n="c56-0121__main__21"/> impression I received from the objects <lb n="c56-0121__main__22"/> around me — Alas! <del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e23003__Start"/>who can boast<del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e23003__End"/> why <lb n="c56-0121__main__23"/> does man boast of sensibilities above <lb n="c56-0121__main__24"/> those apparent in the brute it only <lb n="c56-0121__main__25"/> renders them more necessary beings. Hunger <lb n="c56-0121__main__26"/>& desire and If our impulses were <lb n="c56-0121__main__27"/> confined to hunger thirst and desire <lb n="c56-0121__main__28"/> we might be <del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e23030__Start"/>more<del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e23030__End"/>nearly free but now <lb n="c56-0121__main__29"/> we are moved by every wind that <lb n="c56-0121__main__30"/> blows & by every <del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e23041__Start"/>sc<del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e23041__End"/> chance <del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e23044__Start"/>work<del loc="c56-0121__main__d1e23044__End"/> word or<lb n="c56-0122__main__1"/> scene that that wind may convey to <lb n="c56-0122__main__2"/> us<milestone spanTo="#c56-0122.01" unit="tei:lg"/><lb n="c56-0122__main__3"/> We rest, A dream has power to poison <lb n="c56-0122__main__4"/><metamark>L</metamark> sleep <lb n="c56-0122__main__5"/> We rise one wandering thought pollutes <lb n="c56-0122__main__6"/> the day <lb n="c56-0122__main__7"/> We feel conceive, or reason – laugh or weep <lb n="c56-0122__main__8"/> Embrace fond woe or cast our cares <lb n="c56-0122__main__9"/> away<milestone spanTo="#c56-0122.02" unit="tei:lg"/><lb n="c56-0122__main__10"/> It is the same –for be it joy or sorrow <lb n="c56-0122__main__11"/> The path of its departure still is free <lb n="c56-0122__main__12"/> Mans yesterday may ne'er be like <lb n="c56-0122__main__13"/>his morrow <lb n="c56-0122__main__14"/> Nought may endure but mutability.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0122__main__15"/> It was noon when I arrived at the <lb n="c56-0122__main__16"/> top of the <del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23108__Start"/>mountain<del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23108__End"/>ascent. For some time I <lb n="c56-0122__main__17"/> sat upon the <del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23117__Start"/>the<del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23117__End"/> rock that overlooks <lb n="c56-0122__main__18"/> the sea of ice. A mist covered both <lb n="c56-0122__main__19"/> that and the surrounding <mdel>mo</mdel>untains <lb n="c56-0122__main__20"/> Presently a breeze dissipated the mist <lb n="c56-0122__main__21"/> and I descended on the <del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23136__Start"/>ice<del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23136__End"/>glacier. It is in<del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23148__Start"/>s<del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23148__End"/>tersper<lb n="c56-0122__main__22"/>sed with rifts – The surface is very uneven <lb n="c56-0122__main__23"/> rising like the waves of a troubled sea, <lb n="c56-0122__main__24"/> decending <del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23162__Start"/>tow<del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23162__End"/> low, & in<mdel>s</mdel>terspered by rifts <lb n="c56-0122__main__25"/> that sink deep— The <del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23178__Start"/>width of the<del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23178__End"/>field of<lb n="c56-0122__main__26"/> ice is <del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23187__Start"/>nearly<del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23187__End"/> a <del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23191__Start"/>lege<del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23191__End"/> league,<metamark>^</metamark>in width, but I was <lb n="c56-0122__main__27"/> nearly two hours in crossing it – Theoppo<lb n="c56-0122__main__28"/>site<del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23216__Start"/>t<del loc="c56-0122__main__d1e23216__End"/> mountain is a bare perpendicu<lb n="c56-0122__main__29"/>lar rock.–From that side where I now <lb n="c56-0122__main__30"/> stood Montanvert was exactly opposite <lb n="c56-0122__main__31"/> at the distance of a league and above<lb n="c56-0123__main__1"/> I should listen to the dæmon – my <lb n="c56-0123__main__2"/> feelings were against it but the <lb n="c56-0123__main__3"/> misery he expressed had al<del loc="c56-0123__main__d1e23245__Start"/>l<del loc="c56-0123__main__d1e23245__End"/>ready <lb n="c56-0123__main__4"/> moved my compassion and I thought <lb n="c56-0123__main__5"/> the least justice I could shew would <lb n="c56-0123__main__6"/> be to listen to to his tale.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0123__main__7"/> We entered the hut – the monster <lb n="c56-0123__main__8"/> lighted a fire and sitting by it he <lb n="c56-0123__main__9"/> began thus.<lb n="c56-0123__main__10"/> it rose Mont Blanc in awful majesty. I re<lb n="c56-0123__main__11"/>mained in a recess of the rock gazing on <lb n="c56-0123__main__12"/> this wonderful & stupedous scene – <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__1"/> the sea or <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__2"/> rather the vast river of <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__3"/> ice, wound among <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__4"/><del loc="c56-0123__left_margin__d1e23295__Start"/>the<del loc="c56-0123__left_margin__d1e23295__End"/> its dependant <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__5"/> mountains whose <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__6"/> aerial summits <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__7"/> hung over its <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__8"/> recesses. Thier <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__9"/> icy & glittering <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__10"/> peaks shone <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__11"/> in sunlight <lb n="c56-0123__left_margin__12"/> over the clouds. My heart <lb n="c56-0123__main__13"/> before<metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c56-0123__main__d1e23326__Start"/>sad<del loc="c56-0123__main__d1e23326__End"/>which was sorrowful<mdel>ly</mdel>, now swelled with somthing like <lb n="c56-0123__main__14"/> joy <del loc="c56-0123__main__d1e23339__Start"/>I clas<del loc="c56-0123__main__d1e23339__End"/> I exclaimed – Wandering spirits, <lb n="c56-0123__main__15"/> if indeed ye wander and do not rest in <lb n="c56-0123__main__16"/> your narrow beds, allow me this faint <lb n="c56-0123__main__17"/> happiness or take me as your compa<lb n="c56-0123__main__18"/>nion away from the joys of life." As I <lb n="c56-0123__main__19"/> said this I suddenly beheld <mdel>a</mdel><del loc="c56-0123__main__d1e23362__Start"/>human<del loc="c56-0123__main__d1e23362__End"/>the<lb n="c56-0123__main__20"/> figure of a man at some distance advancing <lb n="c56-0123__main__21"/> towards me with superhuman speed— <lb n="c56-0123__main__22"/> He bounded over the crevices in the <lb n="c56-0123__main__23"/> ice <mdel>by</mdel>among which I had walked with caution, <lb n="c56-0123__main__24"/> his stature also as he approached seem <lb n="c56-0123__main__25"/> ed to exceed that of man –I was <lb n="c56-0123__main__26"/> troubled — a mist covered my eyes and <lb n="c56-0123__main__27"/> I felt <del loc="c56-0123__main__d1e23401__Start"/>ready to pa faint<del loc="c56-0123__main__d1e23401__End"/>faintness seize me. – The cold breeze <lb n="c56-0123__main__28"/> of the mountains quickly restored me. <lb n="c56-0123__main__29"/><del loc="c56-0123__main__d1e23411__Start"/>But<del loc="c56-0123__main__d1e23411__End"/> I perceived as <mdel>he</mdel>the shape came nearer<lb n="c56-0124__main__1"/> (<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23431__Start"/>oh<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23431__End"/> sight tremendous and abhorred) that it <lb n="c56-0124__main__2"/> was the wretch whom I had <del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23436__Start"/>cr<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23436__End"/> created and <lb n="c56-0124__main__3"/> who had caused me such deep misery. I <lb n="c56-0124__main__4"/> trembled with rage <del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23448__Start"/>an<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23448__End"/> and horror <del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23451__Start"/>determin<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23451__End"/>I<lb n="c56-0124__main__5"/><del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23458__Start"/>ing<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23458__End"/>resolv<mdel>in</mdel>ed<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23470__Start"/>g<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23470__End"/> to wait his approach& then close <lb n="c56-0124__main__6"/> with him in mortal combat. He ap<lb n="c56-0124__main__7"/>proached; I <del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23483__Start"/>saw again that form from which<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23483__End"/><lb n="c56-0124__main__8"/><del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23487__Start"/>I<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23487__End"/> His countenance bespoke bitter anguish <lb n="c56-0124__main__9"/> combined with d<mdel>e</mdel>isdain and malignancy. <lb n="c56-0124__main__10"/> But I <del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23507__Start"/>hardly<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23507__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>scarcely observed this–anger and hatred <lb n="c56-0124__main__11"/><del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23519__Start"/>at f<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23519__End"/> had at first deprived me of utterance <lb n="c56-0124__main__12"/> and I recovered only to overwhelm him <lb n="c56-0124__main__13"/> with <del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23527__Start"/>express<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23527__End"/> words expressive of utter <lb n="c56-0124__main__14"/> detestation <del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23532__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23532__End"/><del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23535__Start"/>re<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23535__End"/> and contempt – "Devil" <lb n="c56-0124__main__15"/> I exclaimed – "do you dare approach me <lb n="c56-0124__main__16"/> and do not <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>you dread the fierce vengeance <lb n="c56-0124__main__17"/> of my arm wreaked on your miserable <lb n="c56-0124__main__18"/> head – Begone vile insect or <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>rather Stay that <lb n="c56-0124__main__19"/> I may trample you to dust and oh that <lb n="c56-0124__main__20"/> I could with <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the <del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23583__Start"/>end<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23583__End"/>extinction of your miserable existence <lb n="c56-0124__main__21"/> restore those creatures whom you <lb n="c56-0124__main__22"/> have diabollicaly murdered"<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0124__main__23"/> "I expected this reception" said the dæmon <lb n="c56-0124__main__24"/> all men hate <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the wretched – how then <lb n="c56-0124__main__25"/> must <mdel>O</mdel>I be hated who am miserable <lb n="c56-0124__main__26"/> beyond <del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23630__Start"/>conception or<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23630__End"/><del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23633__Start"/>idea<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23633__End"/>all living things. – Yet you <lb n="c56-0124__main__27"/><del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23641__Start"/>my<del loc="c56-0124__main__d1e23641__End"/> my creator hate me and spurn me<lb n="c56-0125__main__1"/><del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23650__Start"/>me<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23650__End"/> thy creature to whom thou art <lb n="c56-0125__main__2"/> bound with ties only dissoluble by the <lb n="c56-0125__main__3"/> death of one of us. <del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23657__Start"/>And<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23657__End"/><mdel>y</mdel>You <del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23668__Start"/>wish<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23668__End"/>purpose to kill <lb n="c56-0125__main__4"/> me. <del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23675__Start"/>And<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23675__End"/><mdel>h</mdel>How dare you sport thus <lb n="c56-0125__main__5"/> with life? Do your duty towards me <lb n="c56-0125__main__6"/> and I will do mine towards you &<lb n="c56-0125__main__7"/> the rest of mankind. <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>If you comply with my conditions –I will leave them <lb n="c56-0125__main__8"/> and you at peace – but as I am if <lb n="c56-0125__main__9"/> you do not comply with my conti condi <lb n="c56-0125__main__10"/> tionsbut if you refuse I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>will glut the <del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23719__Start"/>t<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23719__End"/> maw of death untill <lb n="c56-0125__main__11"/><mdel>he</mdel>it be <del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23730__Start"/>satiate<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23730__End"/> satiated even with your <lb n="c56-0125__main__12"/> dearest friends."<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0125__main__13"/> "<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23739__Start"/>Miserable<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23739__End"/><del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23742__Start"/>wretch<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23742__End"/> Abhorred monster, <lb n="c56-0125__main__14"/> cried I furiously, fiend that thou art <lb n="c56-0125__main__15"/> the tortures of Hell are too <del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23751__Start"/>soft for thee<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23751__End"/><lb n="c56-0125__left_margin__1"/> mild a <lb n="c56-0125__left_margin__2"/> vengeance for <lb n="c56-0125__left_margin__3"/> thy crimes.<lb n="c56-0125__main__16"/> wretched devil! you reproach me <lb n="c56-0125__main__17"/> with your creation; come, that I may <lb n="c56-0125__main__18"/> extinguish the spark that I so negli<lb n="c56-0125__main__19"/>gently bestowed." My rage was without <lb n="c56-0125__main__20"/> bounds I sprung on him <del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23781__Start"/>that I<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23781__End"/><del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23783__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23783__End"/><lb n="c56-0125__main__21"/><del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23789__Start"/>might destroy so hateful a monster–<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23789__End"/><del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23792__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23792__End"/> impelled by all the feelings which can arm one<lb n="c56-0125__left_margin__1"/> being against <lb n="c56-0125__left_margin__2"/> the existence <lb n="c56-0125__left_margin__3"/> of another.<lb n="c56-0125__main__22"/> He eluded me easily, and said – Be calm! I entreat <lb n="c56-0125__main__23"/><del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23816__Start"/>h<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23816__End"/> you to hear me, before you give vent <lb n="c56-0125__main__24"/> to your hatred upon my devoted head–. Have <lb n="c56-0125__main__25"/> I not suffer<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23830__Start"/>r<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23830__End"/>ed enough that you <lb n="c56-0125__main__26"/><del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23834__Start"/>should<del loc="c56-0125__main__d1e23834__End"/> wish to encrease my misery–Life <lb n="c56-0125__main__27"/> although it be only an accumulation <lb n="c56-0125__main__28"/> of anguish is dear to me and I will defend <lb n="c56-0125__main__29"/> it remember thou hast made me more<lb n="c56-0126__main__1"/> powe<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>rful than thyself my height is superior <lb n="c56-0126__main__2"/> to yours my joints more supple. But I <lb n="c56-0126__main__3"/><del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23865__Start"/>do not wish to trave<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23865__End"/><del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23870__Start"/>you<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23870__End"/>will not be tempted to set myself in opposition to thee, I am thy <lb n="c56-0126__main__4"/> creature and <del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23880__Start"/>I<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23880__End"/> wi<mdel>th</mdel>ll be even mild and docile <lb n="c56-0126__main__5"/><del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23898__Start"/>to you<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23898__End"/><lb n="c56-0126__left_margin__1"/>to thee, <del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23913__Start"/>my gentle master<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23913__End"/>my natural master & king, – if <del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23923__Start"/>you<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23923__End"/>thou will <lb n="c56-0126__main__6"/> perform <del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23934__Start"/>your<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23934__End"/>thy part also, the which thou owest me dut<mdel>y</mdel>ies<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23952__Start"/>towards<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23952__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark> me. Oh Fran<lb n="c56-0126__main__7"/>kenstein, do not be equitable to every other <lb n="c56-0126__main__8"/> and trample upon me alone to whom thy <lb n="c56-0126__main__9"/> justice & even <del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23980__Start"/>mere<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23980__End"/><del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23983__Start"/>charity<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23983__End"/>they clemency, thy affection is most <lb n="c56-0126__main__10"/> due. <del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23992__Start"/>Remb<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e23992__End"/> Remember that I am <lb n="c56-0126__main__11"/> thy creature – I ought to be Thy Adam – <mdel>or</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>but I am rather the <lb n="c56-0126__main__12"/> fallen angel <del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e24018__Start"/>for<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e24018__End"/>whom thou driven from joy for no misdeed; every where I see <lb n="c56-0126__main__13"/> bliss from whi<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e24032__Start"/>ile<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e24032__End"/>ch I alome am irrecoverably <lb n="c56-0126__main__14"/><del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e24043__Start"/>wretched<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e24043__End"/><lb n="c56-0126__left_margin__1"/>excluded. I was benevolent and good: <lb n="c56-0126__main__15"/> misery made me a fiend. Make me <lb n="c56-0126__main__16"/> happy and I shall again be virtuous<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0126__main__17"/> Begone replied I – I <del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e24062__Start"/>cannot and<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e24062__End"/><lb n="c56-0126__main__18"/> will not hear you. there can be no <lb n="c56-0126__main__19"/> community between you and I– We are <lb n="c56-0126__main__20"/> enemies — Begone or <del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e24072__Start"/>allhow<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e24072__End"/> let us try <lb n="c56-0126__main__21"/> our streng<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e24077__Start"/>h<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e24077__End"/>th in a fight in which <lb n="c56-0126__main__22"/> one must fall."<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0126__main__23"/>><del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e24087__Start"/>How<del loc="c56-0126__main__d1e24087__End"/> How can I move you? said the <lb n="c56-0126__main__24"/> fiend— Will no entreaties cause you <lb n="c56-0126__main__25"/> to turn a favourable eye upon thy <lb n="c56-0126__main__26"/> creature who implores thy goodness and <lb n="c56-0126__main__27"/> compassion – Believe me, Frankenstien <lb n="c56-0126__main__28"/> I was benevolent —my soul glowed with<lb n="c56-0127__main__1"/> love and humanity but am I not alone <lb n="c56-0127__main__2"/> miserably alone – None to love me but <lb n="c56-0127__main__3"/> all fly<del loc="c56-0127__main__d1e24118__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0127__main__d1e24118__End"/> You, my creator abhor me <lb n="c56-0127__main__4"/> What hope <del loc="c56-0127__main__d1e24125__Start"/>have I then from<del loc="c56-0127__main__d1e24125__End"/>can I gather from your <lb n="c56-0127__main__5"/> fellow creatures <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>who owe me nothing.—They spurn and <del loc="c56-0127__main__d1e24146__Start"/>abhor<del loc="c56-0127__main__d1e24146__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>hate<lb n="c56-0127__main__6"/> me. The desart mountains and mourful <lb n="c56-0127__main__7"/> glaciers are my refuge—I have wandered <lb n="c56-0127__main__8"/> here many days– The caves of ice <del loc="c56-0127__main__d1e24166__Start"/>are my<del loc="c56-0127__main__d1e24166__End"/>which<lb n="c56-0127__main__9"/> I only do not fear are a dwelling to me and <lb n="c56-0127__main__10"/> the only one which man does not grudge <lb n="c56-0127__main__11"/><del loc="c56-0127__main__d1e24181__Start"/>to me<del loc="c56-0127__main__d1e24181__End"/> — <del <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>will keep no <del loc="c56-0127__main__d1e24313__Start"/>temm<del loc="c56-0127__main__d1e24313__End"/> terms with <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>my wretchedness– Yet it is in your pow<mdel>re</mdel>er<lb n="c56-0127__main__20"/> to recompense me and deliver them from <lb n="c56-0127__main__21"/> an evil which<metamark speedy ruin.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0129__main__9"/> As he said this he led the way <lb n="c56-0129__main__10"/> across the ice –I followed – my heart was <lb n="c56-0129__main__11"/> full and I did not answer him but <lb n="c56-0129__main__12"/><del loc="c56-0129__main__d1e24764__Start"/>when<del loc="c56-0129__main__d1e24764__End"/><lb n="c56-0129__left_margin__1"/>as I proceeded I n="c56-0129__left_margin__1"/>least to listen to his tale—I was partly urged <lb n="c56-0129__main__15"/> by curiosity, and compassion confirmed <lb n="c56-0129__main__16"/> me.– <del loc="c56-0129__main__d1e24803__Start"/>As<del loc="c56-0129__main__d1e24803__End"/><del loc="c56-0129__main__d1e24806__Start"/>I was not<del loc="c56-0129__main__d1e24806__End"/> I had hitherto suppos<lb n="c56-0129__main__17"/>ed him to be the murderer of my brother <lb n="c56-0129__main__18"/> and I wished to find this either confirmed <lb n="c56-0129__main__19"/> or denied<del loc="c56-0129__main__d1e24827__Start"/>.<del loc="c56-0129__main__d1e24827__End"/><lb n="c56-0129__left_margin__1"/> I eagerly sought <lb n="c56-0129__left_margin__2"/> a confirma<lb n="c56-0129__left_margin__3"/>tion or denial <lb n="c56-0129__left_margin__4"/> of this opinion. For the first time also I felt <lb n="c56-0129__main__20"/> what the duties of a creator towards his <lb n="c56-0129__main__21"/> creature were and that I ought to <lb n="c56-0129__main__22"/> render him happy before I complained <lb n="c56-0129__main__23"/> of his wickedness. these motives urged me <lb n="c56-0129__main__24"/> to comply with his <del loc="c56-0129__main__d1e24862__Start"/>request<del loc="c56-0129__main__d1e24862__End"/>demand – We crossed <lb n="c56-0129__main__25"/> the ice therefore, and ascended the <lb n="c56-0129__main__26"/> opposite rock.– The air was cold and <lb n="c56-0129__main__27"/> the rain began again to descend–We <lb n="c56-0129__main__28"/> entered the hut – the fiend with an <lb n="c56-0129__main__29"/> air of exultation I with a heavy<lb n="c56-0130__main__1"/> heart and depressed spirits – But I consented <lb n="c56-0130__main__2"/> to listen and <del loc="c56-0130__main__d1e24891__Start"/>sitting<del loc="c56-0130__main__d1e24891__End"/>seating myself by the fire which he <lb n="c56-0130__main__3"/> lighted he thus <del loc="c56-0130__main__d1e24900__Start"/>began<del loc="c56-0130__main__d1e24900__End"/> began his tale.
